Magic Notes:
Archdruid: May use Wild Shape at will
Bonus Cantrip (Circle Of The Land): Knows an additional Druid cantrip
Circle Forms: May Wild Shape into a CR 6 creature
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 W0 spells/May cast chosen W1 spell 1/long rest
Archdruid: Casting spells requires no verbal, somatic, or cost-free material components
Beast Spells: May cast spells during Wild Shape
Combat Wild Shape: May use a spell slot to regain (slot level)d8 HP during Wild Shape
Elemental Adept (Cold): Cold spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Wild Shape: May use 2 Wild Shape uses to become an elemental
Natural Recovery: May recover 10 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest 1/long rest
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Thousand Forms: May cast Alter Self at will
Wild Shape: May transform into a CR 6 creature for 10 hr unlimited/short rest
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 1 available vs. 9 allocated
